1370: Rolekine moved to Cromme straet.A.6 after marriage.
Got married to Sara at age 22 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Sara, Ioris, at age 24.
1374: Had a son with Sara, Ricward, at age 26.
1375: Had a daughter with Sara, Lutghardis, at age 27.
Lost daughter Lutghardis when Lutghardis was 1 years old.
1377: Had a son with Sara, Falco, at age 29.
1378: Had a daughter with Sara, Rycaldis, at age 30.
Lost daughter Rycaldis when Rycaldis was 1 years old.
1382: Lost his wife Sara while she was giving birth to Herbert in 1382.
Became caretaker of Ioris, Ricward, Falco, Herbert at age 35.
1384: Lost son Falco when Falco was 8 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1395: Lost son Herbert when Herbert was 14 years old.
